name: vocationally

in a way that provides skills that prepare you for a job, or that relates to a particular type of work: There is a deliberate effort made to provide courses that are vocationally relevant. As the course is vocationally based, there is a high practical content. See

More examplesFewer examplesThese degrees offer a vocationally focused route into higher education.Children will be encouraged to continue learning langauges, whether academically or vocationally.I had no idea of what I wanted to do vocationally.
